subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Arsenal has finally won a major continental competition. No, not that Arsenal, the fabled Gunners who call north London home. But Arsenal de Sarandí of Avellaneda, Argentina.
snippet: Arsenal has finally won a major continental competition. No, not that Arsenal, the fabled Gunners who call north London home. But Arsenal de Sarandí of Avellaneda, Argentina.
